Posts.EditableText:
It's not all midi based. You can make tracks in reason without having keys. Infact, I'm 100% certain that it's more oriented with sound than midi. the keyboard acts as a controller. You play the keys, instead of having to tediously handpick where you want to put the notes.

I used to mess around with reason, but sense I got my Korg Triton, I got Ableton Live.
